title: India is the largest private equity destination for us outside the US: Chip Kaye, chairman, Warburg Pincus
description: Kaye and Jeffrey Perlman, the firm’s CEO, along with other senior management, are in India to celebrate their 30-year investing journey. Starting with backing entrepreneurs and businesses such as Sunil Mittal, HDFC, IDFC, among others, the firm has, over the last three decades, backed 80 companies.

title: Pizza Hut reset in focus as Devyani International appoints new CEO
description: Manish Dawar, the incoming president and chief executive, said Devyani International will add zero net new Pizza Hut outlets in 2026, shifting attention instead to fixing the fundamentals.

title: Today, the AI story is not well understood in the Indian market: Fractal CEO
description: There's a huge need to just educate the market on AI because there are not a lot of AI stocks out there, says Fractal Analytics' founder Srikanth Velamakanni.

title: IndiGo reduces Manchester, London flights, to suspend Copenhagen services - check schedule here
description: IndiGo, in a statement released on Wednesday, announced the revised schedule for its long-haul flights, trimming services on Copenhagen, Manchester and London sectors. Here's the full revised schedule.

title: With two partnerships in two weeks, Adani ramps up defence push
description: Adani Group is aggressively accelerating its bid to strengthen its presence in the Indian defence sector, securing its second major international aerospace partnership in just two weeks.

title: Byju’s resolution professional aims at Raveendran Singapore firm in Aakash control battle
description: As Byju's navigates a bankruptcy resolution, the spotlight is back on Beeaar, a Singapore firm owned by promoter Byju Raveendran. The resolution professional has alleged Beeaar's directors acted in a way that shareholder structures and covenants in Aakash Educational Services were violated.

title: Here's how the top H-1B sponsor is turning to India as Trump tightens visa rules
description: The expansion plan comes amid tighter US immigration policies under Donald Trump. In January this year, Washington announced an indefinite pause on immigrant visa processing for applicants from 75 countries.

title: OpenAI vs Elon Musk: Sam Altman says getting xAI CEO under oath will be 'Christmas in April'
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman in a recent post says he is relishing the possibility of having Elon Musk under oath. Notably, Musk's lawsuit against OpenAI is set to begin trial in April.

title: Josh D'Amaro to get $45 million in first year as Disney CEO, but there's more
description: Disney has fixed D'Amaro's annual base salary at $2.5 million, and he will receive a long-term incentive award with a target value of $26.3 million each fiscal year.

title: M&M secures deal to supply 35,000 Scorpio Pik Ups to Indonesian govt company Agrinas in 2026
description: Under the partnership, Mahindra and Agrinas Pangan Nusantara will work together to equip Koperasi with these vehicles to ensure effective and seamless flow of fresh supplies from farmers directly to the marketplace, thereby bridging the gap between producer and consumer.

title: Buy HDFC Bank; target of Rs 1,850: ICICI Securities
description: ICICI Securities is bullish on HDFC Bank has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1,850 in its research report dated April 21, 2024.

title: Buy Tejas Networks; target of Rs 1100: Emkay Global Financial
description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Tejas Networks has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 1100 in its research report dated April 23, 2024.

title: Buy Bajaj Finance; target of Rs 9000: Emkay Global Financial
description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Bajaj Finance has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 9000 in its research report dated April 23, 2024.

title: Buy Bajaj Finance; target of Rs 9000: Emkay Global Financial
description: Emkay Global Financial is bullish on Bajaj Finance has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 9000 in its research report dated April 23, 2024.

title: Reduce Persistent Systems; target of Rs 3700: Emkay Global Financial
description: Emkay Global Financial recommended reduce rating on Persistent Systems with a target price of Rs 3700 in its research report dated April 22, 2024.

title: Reduce Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail; target of Rs 230: Emkay Global Financial
description: Emkay Global Financial recommended reduce rating on Aditya Birla Fashion and Retail with a target price of Rs 230 in its research report dated April 23, 2024.

title: Reduce Wipro; target of Rs 410: ICICI Securities
description: ICICI Securities is bullish on Wipro has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 410 in its research report dated April 21, 2024.

title: Buy HDFC Life Insurance Company; target of Rs 739: ICICI Securities
description: ICICI Securities is bullish on HDFC Life Insurance Company has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 739 in its research report dated April 21, 2024.

title: Buy Patel Engineering; target of Rs 80: ICICI Direct
description: ICICI Direct is bullish on Patel Engineering recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 80 in its research report dated April 22, 2024.

title: Accumulate Infosys; target of Rs 1531: KR Choksey
description: KR Choksey recommended Accumulate rating on Infosys with a target price of Rs 1531 in its research report dated April 22, 2024.

title: Market Trading Guide: Buy Blue Star and Kirloskar Oil on Thursday for up to 5% short term gains
description: Nifty closed higher for a second consecutive day, despite IT sector weakness, as other sectors gained momentum. Analysts noted initial market hesitation followed by a recovery, indicating buying interest at lower levels. Immediate resistance is seen at 25,900-25,950, with support at 25,600-25,650.

title: US stocks edge up as Lilly, Super Micro earnings cushion software jitters
description: The ‍S&P 500 ​opened largely ⁠flat and the Dow marginally higher on Wednesday, ‌following ‌upbeat results from Eli Lilly ‌and Super Micro Computer, while investors avoided big bets on software ​and cloud ​stocks after a ‌bruising ‍selloff in the ‍previous session.

title: NSE board to meet on February 6 to constitute IPO panel
description: The National Stock Exchange board will meet on February 6 to begin its initial public offering process. This follows regulatory clearance from Sebi. A special committee will be formed to oversee the listing. The exchange's financial results will also be reviewed. This marks a significant step after a decade of delays.

title: Sebi modifies Order-to-Trade Ratio framework for algorithmic trading. Key changes explained
description: Sebi is refining its Order-to-Trade Ratio framework for algorithmic orders, effective April 6, 2026. New exemptions for equity options and specific price bands aim to balance market liquidity with preventing excessive order placement. These changes follow stakeholder input and acknowledge the role of market makers. Separately, Sebi proposed overhauling its 'fit and proper person' rules for intermediaries.

title: Nasdaq proposes 'fast entry' rule to speed up inclusion of large new listings
description: Nasdaq plans a new rule to swiftly include major new companies in its index. This aims to fix delays that have kept big IPOs and transfers out of the benchmark. The 'Fast Entry' rule will allow top-ranked companies to join quickly. This is important as 2026 expects many large listings, including from SpaceX and Anthropic.

title: Devyani International Q3 Results: Loss widens to Rs 109 crore, revenue up 11%
description: Devyani International Ltd announced a net loss of Rs 109.78 crore for the December quarter of FY26. This marks an increase from the previous year's loss. However, the company saw its revenue from operations rise by 11.31 percent. Its Biryani by Kilo business reached breakeven. Devyani International is a major franchisee for KFC and Pizza Hut in India.

title: Nykaa Q3 Results Preview: PAT may surge up to 192% YoY led by BPC momentum; revenue to rise up to 28%
description: Nykaa is poised for a strong performance in the December quarter. Robust festive demand and sustained momentum in its Beauty and Personal Care segment are expected to drive significant profit growth. Brokerage estimates project a substantial surge in net profit and revenue. The company is set to announce its earnings on Thursday, February 5.

title: Gold, silver or stocks? How Mukesh Ambani believes average Indian saver can compound wealth
description: Mukesh Ambani urged Indians to shift savings from gold and silver into capital markets, arguing that precious metals, though safe, do not create wealth in a fast-growing economy. Speaking at a JioBlackRock event, he said productive investments offer compounding returns, unlike bullion imports that sit idle outside the formal financial system.

title: Indian bonds rise ahead of RBI debt purchase, policy outcome
description: Indian government bonds rose for a second straight session as expectations of continued RBI bond purchases supported sentiment ahead of record FY27 borrowing. The 10-year yield eased to 6.6972%, while markets await the RBI’s policy decision and liquidity outlook. Traders expect no further rate cuts but continued growth-supportive OMO operations.

title: Carlsberg shares rise on profit beats forecasts; co mulls Indian IPO
description: Carlsberg reported a 5% rise in full-year operating profit, exceeding forecasts, and is considering an initial public offering for its Indian operations. The brewer also projected 2-6% profit growth for the current year, despite a challenging consumer environment. The potential Indian IPO could significantly reduce the company's debt.
